findings.title: Fee setter can change fee address receiver
findings.description: The fee setter has the ability to modify the fee address receiver, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner cannot renounce and transfer ownership
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to renounce and transfer ownership.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot set max transaction limit
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to set a maximum transaction limit.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to block users.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause it.

findings.title: Floating Pragma is Set
findings.description: The compiler version should be a fixed one to avoid undiscovered compiler bugs.

findings.title: SafeMath Override
findings.description: SafeMath is no longer needed starting with Solidity v0.8+. The compiler now has built-in overflow checking.
